name: A heavy granite ring
data: It increases the users strength somewhat.
It decreases the users dexterity poorly.
It increases the users constitution adequately.
It decreases the users wisdom adequately.
It has excellent armour class for its type (pathetic in general).
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration a tiny bit.
It increases the users physical resistance adequately.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It decreases the users cold resistance somewhat.
